name: Totop
description: The Totop component allows the user to scroll to top of a page.

properties.name: element
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the element to which the scroll will be.

properties.name: offset
properties.label: Offset
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the scroll offset.

properties.name: position
properties.label: Position
properties.settingTooltip: The position of the up button on the page

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.label: Background
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the up button background.

properties.name: color
properties.label: Color
properties.settingTooltip: The color of the icon inside the up button
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the color of the icon inside the up button.

properties.name: size
properties.label: Button Size
properties.settingTooltip: The size(width/height) of the up button
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the size(width/height) of the up button.

properties.name: iconSize
properties.label: Icon Size
properties.settingTooltip: The size(width/height) of the icon inside the up button
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the size(width/height) of the icon inside the up button.

properties.name: indentX
properties.label: Indent X
properties.settingTooltip: Indent of the up button from the edge of the page horizontally
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the indent of the up button from the edge of the page horizontally.

properties.name: indentY
properties.label: Indent Y
properties.settingTooltip: Indent of the up button from the edge of the page vertically
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the indent of the up button from the edge of the page vertically.
